welcome_message_body: Welcome to Si Racha, Thailand! Get ready to explore our beautiful coastal city, famous for its delicious seafood, stunning beaches, and charming local markets. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Si Racha has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe' Kantary
restaurants.description: Cafe' Kantary is a café located in ศรีราชา.
restaurants.address: Cape Racha, ศรีราชา, ชลบุรี 20110
